title: Delegation of Authority Under Section 404 (c) of the Child Soldiers Prevention Act of 2008
summary: The document is a presidential memorandum from August 4, 2025, delegating authority to the Secretary of State under Section 404(c) of the Child Soldiers Prevention Act of 2008 (CSPA). The memorandum authorizes the Secretary of State to waive the application of the prohibition in Section 404(a) of the CSPA, make necessary determinations and certifications, and notify appropriate congressional committees of such waivers. The memorandum also directs the publication of these determinations and certifications in the Federal Register. The document was published in the Federal Register on August 15, 2025.
